query:
-- Rename snake_case columns to camelCase to match Drizzle schema
ALTER TABLE onboarding_responses
  CHANGE COLUMN `website_id` `websiteId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  CHANGE COLUMN `step_current` `stepCurrent` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  CHANGE COLUMN `business_name` `businessName` varchar(255),
  CHANGE COLUMN `founded_year` `foundedYear` int(11),
  CHANGE COLUMN `team_size` `teamSize` varchar(50),
  CHANGE COLUMN `top_services` `topServices` json,
  CHANGE COLUMN `target_audience` `targetAudience` text,
  CHANGE COLUMN `faq_items` `faqItems` json,
  CHANGE COLUMN `logo_url` `logoUrl` varchar(1024),
  CHANGE COLUMN `photo_urls` `photoUrls` json,
  CHANGE COLUMN `legal_owner` `legalOwner` varchar(255),
  CHANGE COLUMN `legal_street` `legalStreet` varchar(255),
  CHANGE COLUMN `legal_zip` `legalZip` varchar(20),
  CHANGE COLUMN `legal_city` `legalCity` varchar(255),
  CHANGE COLUMN `legal_country` `legalCountry` varchar(100) DEFAULT 'Deutschland',
  CHANGE COLUMN `legal_email` `legalEmail` varchar(255),
  CHANGE COLUMN `legal_phone` `legalPhone` varchar(100),
  CHANGE COLUMN `legal_vat_id` `legalVatId` varchar(100),
  CHANGE COLUMN `legal_register` `legalRegister` varchar(255),
  CHANGE COLUMN `legal_register_court` `legalRegisterCourt` varchar(255),
  CHANGE COLUMN `legal_responsible` `legalResponsible` varchar(255),
  CHANGE COLUMN `add_on_contact_form` `addOnContactForm` tinyint(1) DEFAULT 0,
  CHANGE COLUMN `add_on_gallery` `addOnGallery` tinyint(1) DEFAULT 0,
  CHANGE COLUMN `add_on_subpages` `addOnSubpages` json,
  CHANGE COLUMN `completed_at` `completedAt` bigint(20),
  CHANGE COLUMN `created_at` `createdAt` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
  CHANGE COLUMN `updated_at` `updatedAt` bigint(20) NOT NULL;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Chfak3oyAuqdS1.3559b6fd90a8 --database apEw6nxjMUWAAnU5iycQLf --execute

  CHANGE COLUMN `faq_items` `faqItems` json,
  CHANGE COLUMN `logo_url` `logoUrl` varchar(1024),
  CHANGE COLUMN `photo_urls` `photoUrls` json,

  CHANGE COLUMN `legal_zip` `legalZip` varchar(20),
  CHANGE COLUMN `legal_city` `legalCity` varchar(255),

  CHANGE COLUMN `add_on_subpages` `addOnSubpages` json,
  CHANGE COLUMN `completed_at` `completedAt` bigint(20),
